headline.main: A Secret Trial: It's Not Our Way

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Kangaroo Courts,'' by William Safire (column, Nov. 26):
abstract: Alan Grant letter on William Safire's Nov 26 column favors military trials for terrorist suspects
